Home » 40P8 Dhammapaccanīya (2), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2)
44 Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiduka
Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiduka
63.
194Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivatti dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… . (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
195Hetuyā nava…pe…  purejāte āsevane pañca…pe…  avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
